alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:29PM EDT until June 17 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... Martin County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 728 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Tarboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Washington, Williamston, Bethel, Stokes, Robersonville, Old Ford, Gold Point, Hamilton, Oak City, Smithwick, Parmele, Everetts, Hassell and Beargrass. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. This storm is producing widespread wind damage across the Raleigh area. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
